name: BrooklynNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill uses the RSS feed from Bklyner.com to provide a flash briefing of the latest news about Brooklyn, New York. Links to full articles on Bklyner.com should show up in the Alexa app. This app is not affiliated with Bklyner.com and only utilize their feed information to provide the flash briefing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
